Hello! I'm Niko Yuwono

I'm a software engineer based in Tokyo, Japan. I'm working as an Android Developer but I also learned Computer Vision in the past and like to play with it too. I want to share my thoughts and works about Android Development and Computer Vision here. I hope I can help you!
